page.title: 13HOME LIFE CHILD WEEKEND
page.content: I wake up on Saturday morning, get up and see if my Mum and Dad are downstairs. I wake my brother. We go downstairs, have breakfast and get dressed. Dad gives us{90p}pocket money. We do our shopping in Market Harborough and buy food and clothes. We have fish and chips for a treat at lunch time. After lunch I play with my rollerboots and bike. Dad does some gardening and my brother meets his best friend. After tea I practise my violin pieces before going to bed. On Sunday morning after breakfast I play out with my toys. My brother plays with his{Technic Lego.}Inside Mum makes lunch while Dad tidies the garden. After tea I practise my violin and go to bed looking foreward to school in the in the morning.
